title: Two Worlds
description: Bill Conners is suffering from the new American dream. His job has been shipped overseas and he finds himself overqualified for the menial, minimum-wage jobs that are available.Davis Jefferson is part of the one-percent. Rich, successful and the man who put Bill out of job.When both men fall gravely ill, Davis makes Bill an unbelievable proposition: ten million dollars in exchange for Bill's heart.Faced with a terrible choice, Bill must decide what his life is worth and how much he is worth to his family.
author: Mark           Phillips
